Cesarean section rate : Based big data , investigator introduce international advanced Robson class method identify appropriate level cesarean section rate type population . 3 . Establishment `` Chinese maternal-fetal medical collaboration network '' APP promote natural childbirth .
DOC.brief_title: The Establishment Application New Labor Progress Centered System Reducing Cesarean Section Rates China
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . To describe average labor curve establish new labor progression standard . The investigator investigate current characteristic obstetric population labor progression obstetric intervention China . The investigator compare different effect traditional labor progression management model , new labor progression management model active labor progression management model labor outcome . Based best outcome maternity infant , investigator establish modify new labor progression suitable Chinese . 2 . Cesarean section rate : Based big data , investigator introduce international advanced Robson class method identify appropriate level cesarean section rate type population.the investigator compare cesarean section rate different level hospital evaluate effect reduce cesarean section rate . The investigator also analyze risk factor cesarean section rate ten Robson classification , provide basis reduce cesarean section rate new strategy . 3 . Establishment `` Chinese maternal-fetal medical collaboration network '' mobile application software ( APP ) promote natural childbirth : The investigator establish perinatal data center use hospital information system ( HIS ) system hospital . The investigator predict cesarean section rate relative factor use Robson classification method , propose new strategy reduce cesarean section rate . Meanwhile , investigator develop quality management system toolkit help clinician standardize behavior improve obstetric safety .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Chinese pregnant woman 2. singleton 3. head position 4 . 37 week + 0 day 41weeks + 6 day 5. primipara 6. lowrisk pregnancy 7. vaginal delivery willingness 8. vaginal cervix < 7 cm labor 1. multiple pregnancy 2. nonhead position 3. stillbirth 4. selective cesarean section 5. prenatal cesarean section 6. age < 18 year 7. previous childbirth history 8. pregnancy complication 9. important fetal malformation .
